title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: AATDF-Based Online Collaborative Learning Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can maintain topic coherence at over 80% during online discussions using the AATDF approach
Learners can apply at least three question strategies for in-depth knowledge construction during collaborative learning in mobile environments
Learners can improve group discussion content three or more times and incorporate feedback using automated analysis tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
